column2: BigFish{OnReach}
column3: BigFish{OnEnd}

column2: str
column3: str

column2: REACH!
column3: FAIL!

column2: You sense something larger than even a great takitaro!
column3: You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.

column2: You sense something massive just below the surface!
column3: You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.

column2: The water falls dark...
column3: A faint glow returns to the water.

column2: A golden figure lurks near the surface!
column3: The golden figure has retreated to the murky depths.

column2: Something large has risen from the depths to feed!
column3: You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.

column2: You sense something even more terrible than Canavan in the waters before you!
column3: You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.

column2: You sense a new legend might be told this day...
column3: You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.

column2: It smells of a rat...
column3: The stench has abated.

column2: You sense something deep beneath the magma...
column3: You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.

column2: Something glimmers near the river bed...
column3: You no longer perceive anything out of the ordinary.

column2: You sense the lord of these skies has returned...
column3: You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.

column2: Lady Luck has sidled up beside you...
column3: The good lady has departed.

column2: Something wondrous this way comes...
column3: You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.

column2: The lake begins to radiate with the colors of the rainbow!
column3: The glow fades...

column2: The stones beneath the water begin shifting hither and thither.
column3: The stones are stationary once again.

column2: A massive shadow slides across the loch floor.
column3: The shadow is no more.

column2: You see the flickering light of eyes beneath the waters.
column3: The flickering light fades...

column2: You sense eyes staring up at you from the sandy waters...
column3: You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.

column2: A glimmering jade figure drifts beneath the waters.
column3: The glimmer fades into the depths.

column2: A large shadow dances along the loch floor.
column3: The shadow is no more.

column2: The visage of a gormless-looking Roegadyn stares at you from beneath the waters.
column3: The face vanishes back into the depths.

column2: The ocean begins to twinkle like the stars in the sky.
column3: The twinkle fades to nothing.

column2: A shadow evoking the Lord of the Whorl slithers across the ocean.
column3: The shadow has disappeared.

column2: The coral begins to wriggle about on the ocean floor.
column3: The wriggling stops.

column2: You see a metallic glint just beneath the waters.
column3: The glint vanishes.

column2: A massive boulder begins to writhe on the ocean floor.
column3: The boulder ceases to move.

column2: You spot a glimmer of crimson, as if a ruby has floated to the surface of the ocean.
column3: All hint of crimson vanishes.

column2: The shadow lurking under the surface belongs to a beast spoken of only in legend.
column3: The shadow is no more.

column2: An aura of violent menace rises from the depths!
column3: The sense of menace dissipates.

column2: You glimpse the writhing silhouette of some vast tentacle moving just beneath the water.
column3: The undulating shadow has withdrawn.

column2: You glance down into a pair of astoundingly goblin-like eyes.
column3: You no longer feel the weight of that goblin-like gaze.

column2: You rub your eyes, certain you'd seen a creature with no business being out on the ocean.
column3: The out-of-place creature has moved on...or never was.

column2: A graceful, leafy form appears, swirling and dancing beneath the waves.
column3: The leafy form has swept on out of sight.

column2: A dull cracking and crunching sound echoes up from the sea floor.
column3: The crunching, cracking sounds fade into silence.

column2: A reptilian tail writhes and splashes up to the surface!
column3: The splashing subsides.

column2: The Font's aquatic flora undulates with sudden activity!
column3: The activity subsides...

column2: A massive, ship-shaped silhouette darkens the waters before you.
column3: The shadowy silhouette returns to the depths.

column2: A layer of ice suddenly forms upon the lake's surface!
column3: The frozen surface thaws.

column2: A profound melancholy swells within you!
column3: The melancholy passes as swiftly as it came...

column2: A large fin breaches the ocean surface!
column3: The fin sinks under the surface and out of sight...

column2: A lethal predator draws close to the ship!
column3: The predator loses interest...

column2: A strip of red and white floats under the water's surface!
column3: You lose sight of the colorful fish...

column2: Something blue glitters deep under the water!
column3: The glittering vanishes...

column2: You feel hungry eyes track your every move!
column3: The hungry thing decides to feast elsewhere...

column2: The sea temperature rises suddenly!
column3: The temperature of the water returns to normal...

column2: The seaweed glimmers with a strange light!
column3: The seaweed glimmers no more...

column2: The scent of plums rises from the waters!
column3: The scent of plums disappears...

column2: You spot a massive shadow drifting along beneath the clouds.
column3: The shadow is no more.

column2: You glimpse the blurred form of some flying creature as it flashes across the sky.
column3: Like a living bolt of lightning, the creature flickers past and is gone.
